/* package codechef; // don't place package name! */

import java.util.*;
import java.lang.*;
import java.io.*;

/* Name of the class has to be "Main" only if the class is public. */
class Codechef
{
	public static void main (String[] args) throws java.lang.Exception
	{
		// your code goes here
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		int n,i,j,k;
		long s,p,m;
		Score temp;
		n=Integer.parseInt(sc.next());
		Score a[]=new Score[n];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
		    s=Integer.parseInt(sc.next());
		    m=Integer.parseInt(sc.next());
		    p=s*m;
		    a[i]=new Score(i+1,p);
		}
msort(a,0,n-1);
k=Integer.parseInt(sc.next());
int b[]=new int[k];
for(i=0;i<k;i++)
{
    b[i]=Integer.parseInt(sc.next());
}
       	for(i=0;i<k;i++)
		System.out.println(a[b[i]-1].x);
	}
	
static void merge(Score a[],int p,int q,int r)
{
	int i=p,k;
	int j=q+1;
	Score b[]=new Score[r-p+1];
	for(k=0;k<=r-p;k++)
	{
		if(j>r)
		b[k]=a[i++];
		else if(i>q)
		b[k]=a[j++];
		else if(a[i].y>=a[j].y)
		{
		    if(a[i].y==a[j].y)
		    {
		        if(a[i].x<a[j].x)
		        b[k]=a[i++];
		    }
		    else
		    b[k]=a[i++];
		}
		else
		b[k]=a[j++];
	}
	for(k=0;k<=r-p;k++)
	a[k+p]=b[k];
}
	
	static void msort(Score a[],int p,int r)
{
	int q;
	if(p<r)
	{
		q=(p+r)/2;
		msort(a,p,q);
		msort(a,q+1,r);
		merge(a,p,q,r);
	}
}
}
class Score
{
    public long x,y;
    Score(long i,long s)
    {
       x=i;
       y=s;
    }
}
